last_episode_to_air.name: Management Fad
last_episode_to_air.overview: Minato's secret is out in the open but a vicious maju is still on the loose. Will Kibou Company summon the goddess or will their efforts prove all for naught?

name: Shachibato! President, It's Time for Battle!
original_name: 社長, バトルの時間です!
overview: Based on the popular strategy game, Minato has become the new president of the Kibou Company. In order to be a good president and help the company grow, he must lead his party of adventurers through the Gate and collect Kirakuri — a type of energy that is extremely valuable and fundamental to the city of Gatepia. However, there are other companies vying for the chance to gather the Kirakuri.

episodes.name: Induction as President
episodes.overview: In a world where businesses make bank through dungeons and battles, Minato is thrown in charge of a small company by his childhood friend-turned-secretary.

episodes.name: Inheritance
episodes.overview: Kibou Company is strapped for cash and their only hope gathers dust in a museum. In order to get it, they'll have to go for broke and compete in a taxing contest.

episodes.name: Order Contest
episodes.overview: While delving deeper into the dungeon and racing onwards towards their goal, Kibou Company encounters the unexpected and must fight to reach the finish.

episodes.name: Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: An arrogant, little wizard by the name of Marika discovers a map which entices the crew on a treasure hunt in search of the most precious treasure of all.

episodes.name: New Employee
episodes.overview: President Minato visits Marika to fetch a form, but then everything goes amiss. There's trouble brewing in Gatepia and it has already claimed a first victim.

episodes.name: Business Goals
episodes.overview: Kibou Company explores the strange, new dungeon in hopes of earning enough to obtain the old man's legacy. However, it's a trial for them in more ways than one.

episodes.name: Interim Report
episodes.overview: Minato bonds with Guide while tackling a mountain of paperwork. Later, Akari finally opens up to Minato and asks a very embarrassing question.

episodes.name: New Species Discovered
episodes.overview: After hearing rumors about a new species of maju that's able to talk, Makoto is unable to contain his excitement but his actions put the party in danger.

episodes.name: Knight in Shining Armor
episodes.overview: Makoto's newfound friend had a gash on her leg and he's worried what that might mean. Now he's desperate and determined to find Mineko before it's too late.

episodes.name: Corporate Warrior
episodes.overview: Minato gets to see a new side of Yutoria when the two of them are talked into exploring a dungeon together. Her fighting skills may be sick, but so is she.

episodes.name: Business Opportunity
episodes.overview: When a new dungeon seemingly sprouts from the ground, the crew goes on the hunt for kirakuri. But what they don't know is that Minato is hiding secrets from his past.

episodes.name: Management Fad
episodes.overview: Minato's secret is out in the open but a vicious maju is still on the loose. Will Kibou Company summon the goddess or will their efforts prove all for naught?
